snippet.title: Armello - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Now available on PS4 and Steam: http://bit.ly/1FgAnxl

Armello combines the strategic play of card and board games with RPG elements. Wage epic single and multiplayer strategy battles as you adventure across the land of Armello on your quest for the throne!

Check out http://www.armello.com for more details!

Music: Michael Allen & Lisa Gerrard
